verses.kjv: Give unto the LORD, O ye mighty, give unto the LORD glory and strength.
verses.ct: Ascribe to the LORD, you heavenly beings, ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.

verses.kjv: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name; worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness.
verses.ct: Ascribe to the LORD the glory that his name deserves; worship the LORD in the splendor of his holiness.

verses.kjv: The voice of the LORD is upon the waters: the God of glory thundereth: the LORD is upon many waters.
verses.ct: The voice of the LORD echoes over the waters; the God of glory thunders; the LORD roars over the vast waters.

verses.kjv: The voice of the LORD is powerful; the voice of the LORD is full of majesty.
verses.ct: The voice of the LORD is powerful; the voice of the LORD is full of majesty.

verses.kjv: The voice of the LORD breaketh the cedars; yea, the LORD breaketh the cedars of Lebanon.
verses.ct: The voice of the LORD shatters the cedars; the LORD splinters the cedars of Lebanon.

verses.kjv: He maketh them also to skip like a calf; Lebanon and Sirion like a young unicorn.
verses.ct: He makes Lebanon leap like a calf, and Sirion like a young wild ox.

verses.kjv: The voice of the LORD divideth the flames of fire.
verses.ct: The voice of the LORD strikes with bolts of lightning.

verses.kjv: The voice of the LORD shaketh the wilderness; the LORD shaketh the wilderness of Kadesh.
verses.ct: The voice of the LORD shakes the wilderness; the LORD shakes the wilderness of Kadesh.

verses.kjv: The voice of the LORD maketh the hinds to calve, and discovereth the forests: and in his temple doth every one speak of his glory.
verses.ct: The voice of the LORD causes the deer to give birth and strips the forests bare, and in his temple everyone cries out, "Glory!"

verses.kjv: The LORD sitteth upon the flood; yea, the LORD sitteth King for ever.
verses.ct: The LORD sits enthroned over the flood; the LORD sits as King forever.

verses.kjv: The LORD will give strength unto his people; the LORD will bless his people with peace.
verses.ct: The LORD gives strength to his people; the LORD blesses his people with peace.
